com.DivineInspiration.experimenter.Activity.UI.Stats

Class GraphMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.DivineInspiration.experimenter.Activity.UI.Stats.GraphMaker

  • public class GraphMaker
extends java.lang.Object
    This class uses a factory pattern, handles making Chart objects, which can either be a Histogram/Bar chart or Line graph/line + box plot.

      • makeHistogram

        public static android.view.View makeHistogram(java.util.List<Trial> trials,
                                              android.content.Context context)
        Note: This function assumes all given trials are of the same type as the first element. Makes a Histogram like chart, depending on the types of trial given
        Parameters:
        trials - a list of trial to be used.
        context - a context to inflate view from
        Returns:
        an appropriate chart for the given trial type
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if given list is empty

                                                                      int numberOfBuckets)
        Groups a list of trial into ranges, given the number of desired ranges.
        Parameters:
        trials - list of trials
        numberOfBuckets -
        Returns:
        a List of List of trials, where each inner list has trials belonging in a common range.
